FETCH_USER_INFO_ERORR: Requested user data could not be found.
ERROR_IN_ADDING_USER: There is an error in adding user.
ERROR_IN_SIGN_UP: There is an error in signing up the user.
ERROR_IN_ADDING_RECIPIE: There is an error in adding new recipie.
ERROR_IN_READING_RECIPIES_OF_USER: There is an error in reading recipes of current user.
GET_RECIPE_ERROR_MESAGE: There is an error in reading recipe with this ID
NO_LOGGED_IN_USER: There is no logged in user
ERROR_IN_DELETING_RECIPIE: There is an error in deleting the recipie.
ERROR_IN_DELETING_IMAGE: There is an error in deleting the image.
ERROR_IN_UPDATING_USER: There is an error in updating the user
FETCH_RECIPES_SEARCHED_LIST_ERORR: There is an error in query of searched recipes.
ERROR_IN_FOLLOW_USER: There is an error in following the user.
ERROR_IN_READING_FOLLOWERS_OF_USER: There is an error in reading followes of current user.
ERROR_IN_READING_FOLLOWING_OF_USER: There is an error in reading following of current user.
